name: Drone Delivery (vrutik2010)
description:
This is my first Hobby project on Unity. Drone Delivery is a hyper causal game with a deceptively simple objective - Deliver maximum packages without losing more than 10 packages or before the battery runs out.

Perfect to play when you have a few minutes between tasks or meetings and need something simple.

Complete How to Play instructions given in the game

--CREDITS--

ART

Free Casual SoundFX Pack by Tim Beek
